strapiPost.title: Executive Order Leads To Creation Of State Council For Outdoor Recreation
strapiPost.content:
One of the latest executive orders by Gov. Sarah Huckabee Sanders will establish the Natural State Initiative and Natural State Advisory Council to promote outdoor recreation and increase public health and tourism.

  • All natural: In 2021, outdoor recreation generated $3.5b and 40,000 jobs for the state. This order aims to leverage that momentum to establish Arkansas as a leader in the outdoor economy.
  • Pacesetters: Northwest Arkansas has been a leading region for the state in developing outdoor recreation opportunities thanks to initiatives by groups like the NWA Council, Walton Family Foundation, and the NWA Regional Planning Commission.

Read more on the story HERE.
